title_widget: Add Widgets To Your Home Screen
detail_widget_1: Touch and hold an empty area on you Home Screen until the apps jiggle
detail_widget_2: Click the ( + ) button in the upper
detail_widget_4: Select a size and click "Add Widget". That\'s it!
